title:
Experimental Investigation into Split Nonlinearity Compensation in
  Single and Multi-channel WDM Systems
authors:
Ronit Sohanpal, Eric Sillekens, Jiaqian Yang, R\^omulo Aparecido,
  Zhixin Liu, Robert Killey, Polina Bayvel
abstract:
We experimentally investigated the performance of split nonlinearity
compensation schemes for single and multi-channel WDM systems. We show that
split NLC SNR gains of more than 0.4 dB at 5540 km can be achieved compared to
transmitter- or receiver-side DBP alone when signal-ASE beating limits
transmission performance.
subjects: Electrical Engineering and Systems Science/Signal Processing
